statements: DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE product_name = 'Product X' AND sale_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM historical_sales WHERE sales_id = 100 AND total_sales < 500.00;
DELETE FROM sales_items WHERE price > 100.00 AND quantity <= 10;
DELETE FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500;
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Laptop' AND category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM categories WHERE category_name = 'Electronics');
DELETE FROM order_details WHERE order_id = 201 AND product_id = 301 AND quantity = 5;
